name: Charizard
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to unintentionally cause forest fires.

abilities.name: Energy Burn
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may turn all Energy attached to Charizard into {R} Energy for the rest of the turn. This power can’t be used if Charizard is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard in order to use this attack.
